core_lines.name: ta!help
core_lines.value: - *You are looking at it right now!* <:TsuSmileBot:541997306413580288>

core_lines.name: ta!help categories
core_lines.value: - *Shows you all the possible categories for help, including this one!*

core_lines.name: ta!invite
core_lines.value: - *DM's you an invite link for the bot!*

core_lines.name: ta!discord
core_lines.value: - *DM's you an invite link for the bot's Discord server!*

core_lines.name: ta!github
core_lines.value: - *Gives you your very own link to the bot's Github page!*

admin_lines.name: ta!warn <id/mention>
admin_lines.value: - *Warns the specified user. Set the maximum warns before someone gets kicked using ta!set_max_warns*

admin_lines.name: ta!kick <id/mention>
admin_lines.value: - *Kicks the specified user. DM's the user in question a message, configured using ta!set_kick_message*

admin_lines.name: ta!ban <id/mention>
admin_lines.value: - *Bans the specified user. DM's the user in question a message, configured using ta!set_ban_message*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_kick_message <message>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the message that gets sent to anyone kicked using the bot.*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_ban_message <message>
admin_lines.value: - *Same as ta!set_kick_message, but for banned people.*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_kick_message
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the message that gets sent to anyone kicked using the bot.*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_ban_message
admin_lines.value: - *Same as ta!get_ban_message, but for banned people.*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_warning_channel <id/channel-mention>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the channel that warnings are logged to!*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_warning_channel
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the channel that warnings are logged to!*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_warns <id>
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the amount of warnings a person has!*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_max_warns <number>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the amount of warnings a person can have before they get kicked!*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_max_warns
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the amount of warnings a person can have before they get kicked!*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_word_blacklist <list>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the word blacklist. Any messages with these words get deleted. List is specified as words separated by commas, no spaces.*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_slowmode_delay <number>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the slowmode delay for the current channel. Kind of useless, as  you can set it using the GUI.*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_welcome_channel <id/channel-mention>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the welcome channel for new people!*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_welcome_channel
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the welcome channel for new people!*

admin_lines.name: ta!set_join_message <message>
admin_lines.value: - *Sets the join message for new members! Possible dynamic values are {user} and {guild}.*

admin_lines.name: ta!get_join_message
admin_lines.value: - *Gets the current join message for new members!*
